description:
Course Description

Learn the most used video editing skills and screen capture techniques with Camtasia to quickly transform presentations into well crafted professional works of communication excellence.

Build a strong foundation to capture screen recordings and edit video to create stunning creative visual presentations

  • Choose the right software for screen recording and video editing
  • Organize your video projects to save production time
  • Capture screen demonstrations directly to video
  • Import video and media content for editing
  • Learn to edit video content with the most often used techniques
  • Get the best sound from your audio
  • Add stunning visual effects to your videos
  • Publish your edited videos with the best quality
  • Create a teleprompter set-up for on camera video presentations

A Powerful Skill at Your Fingertips

Learning fundamentals of video editing and screen recording puts powerful skills at your fingertips. The editing techniques are easy to learn and the demonstrations provide ways to SEE IT, TRY IT, and USE IT as you follow along, practice with supplied files, and then create based on your original content needs. 

Content and Overview

Suitable for beginning video editors, trainers, online instructors, curriculum developers, marketers, and creative entrepreneurs, through this course of 14 lectures and 1 hour of content, you’ll learn the most used functions for editing and screen recording for creating great looking visual presentations with Camtasia. Each concept is first demonstrated with follow along videos with step by step instructions. Practice sessions are provided with supplied files for your opportunity to try out the techniques. Creative opportunities are unleashed with the starter models for your own custom productions so that you can go from novice to pro in a short amount of time.

What am I going to get from this course?

  • 14 lectures and 1 hour of focused content for the skills that matter most!
  • Learn video editing from a professional coach from your desk.
  • Suitable for beginner educators, trainers, marketers, instructional designers and ideal for people who learn faster when shown.
  • Visual training method offering students increased retention and accelerated learning.
  • Breaks even the most complex functions into simplistic steps to SEE IT, TRY IT, and USE IT with a follow, practice, and then create approach for producing custom video presentations
  • Custom learning is supported with an active discussion

Learn in Minutes, a Unique Approach to Fast Learning

Make the jump to learning at light speed with the learn in minutes approach which provides edited video demonstrations for quicker contextual understanding. Quicker access to the concepts helps you learn at your own pace with supporting step by step demonstrations and practice files to apply the techniques. The interactive discussion allows for custom feedback and constructive learning support.

The course also includes a 15% discount to acquiring new versions of Camtasia software.
title: Video University: Learn to Edit Videos with Camtasia
